sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populates the applicable_taxes field for ast_contract</description>
        <name>Contract: Populate tax applicable</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var astContract = new GlideMultipleUpdate("ast_contract");
    astContract.addQuery("tax_exempt", "1");
	astContract.setValue("applicable_taxes", "exempt");
	astContract.execute();

	// Sales flag has priority
    astContract = new GlideMultipleUpdate("ast_contract");
	astContract.addQuery("sales_tax", "1");
	astContract.setValue("applicable_taxes", "sales");
	astContract.execute();
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-22 19:04:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>38fcafd5b733230034d1da23ee11a968</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Populate tax applicable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Contract Management" source="com.snc.contract_management">53e738ac3cb1311068bcf327dfe37ff3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_38fcafd5b733230034d1da23ee11a968</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-02-22 19:08:25</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
